thread.title: Turkey’s Erdogan Tells EU to ‘Forget About’ Migrant Deal After Dutch Row
thread.title_full: Turkey’s Erdogan Tells EU to ‘Forget About’ Migrant Deal After Dutch Row

author: Breitbart London
title: Turkey’s Erdogan Tells EU to ‘Forget About’ Migrant Deal After Dutch Row
text: FILE - In this Feb. 4, 2014 file photo, German Chancellor Angela Merkel, right, listens as Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan, left, speaks during a joint news conference after a meeting at the chancellery in Berlin. Both leaders will meet again on Thursday, Feb. 2, 2017, in Ankara, Turkey, for talks focusing on a troubled European Union deal with the Turkish government to stem the flow of migrants. (AP Photo/Axel Schmidt, File)
